alert.note: Alert for Admiralty Inlet Area; San Juan County; Western Skagit County; Western Whatcom County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued April 03 at 3:08AM PDT until April 04 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM PDT THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, south winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. For the High Wind Watch, south winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph possible. * WHERE...San Juan County, Western Whatcom County, Western Skagit County and Admiralty Inlet Area. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, from 11 AM this morning to 8 PM PDT this evening. For the High Wind Watch, from this evening through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Admiralty Inlet Area; San Juan County; Western Skagit County; Western Whatcom County
